Package Comment

package Comment
The `Comment` package contains classes related to comments (enquiry and suggestion) within the Camp Management System.

Comments are an integral part of the system, providing a means for users to share their thoughts, suggestions, and reviews about camps and related activities. The `Comment` package facilitates the management and organization of this feedback.

  • Class
    Description
    Comment
    Represents an abstract Comment in a system involving Students and Camps.
    CommentType
    Defines an enumeration of comment types that can be associated with comments.
    CommentType.COMMENTTYPES
    Enumeration of comment types.
    Enquiry
    The `Enquiry` class represents an enquiry comment made by a student.
    Suggestion
    The `Suggestion` class represents a suggestion comment made by a camp comittee.
    Suggestion.STATUS
    The Suggestion's status can be either PENDING, APPROVED, or REJECTED
